alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 2:28PM CST until February 16 at 3:15PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Chickasaw County in northeastern Mississippi... Eastern Calhoun County in northeastern Mississippi... Pontotoc County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 315 PM CST. * At 228 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Randolph to near Bellefontaine, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pontotoc, Houston, Trace State Park, Vardaman, Ecru, Pyland, Randolph, Troy, Trebloc, Furrs, Houlka, Sherman, Thaxton, New Houlka, Algoma, Toccopola, Woodland, Robbs, Endville and Cherry Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi.
